attractions.name: Alice in Wonderland
attractions.detail: Take a topsy-turvy trip into the nonsensical world of Disneyâ€™s Alice in Wonderland aboard an oversized caterpillar.

attractions.name: Animation Academy
attractions.location: Disney California Adventure Park, Hollywood Land
attractions.detail: Draw your very own character sketch under the guidance of a talented animator.

attractions.name: Astro Orbitor
attractions.detail: Pilot your very own rocket ship high in the sky amid a gleaming constellation of orbiting planets.

attractions.name: Autopia
attractions.detail: Put the pedal to the metal on an unforgettable road trip along a miniature motorway.

attractions.name: The Bakery Tour
attractions.location: Disney California Adventure Park, Pacific Wharf
attractions.detail: Go on a tasty tour of a real bakery and see how the world-famous San Francisco sourdough bread is made.

attractions.name: Big Thunder Mountain Railroad
attractions.detail: Streak through a haunted gold mine aboard a speeding train on this thrilling coaster-style ride.
